Class Manager

    • hotel.models.Manager
  • public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Manager​(java.lang.String name)
      Only constructor of the Manager class The name should include both first and last name

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean bookRoom​(int number)
      Method which lets the manager choose a room by its number in order to book it
      boolean checkForFreeRooms()
      Method which lets the manager check for free rooms by iterating through all of the rooms and book the first vacant one
      void clearBookings()
      Make all rooms available by calling the freeRoom method of each room object

      • getHotel

      • setHotel

        public void setHotel​(Hotel hotel)
        Setter method which assigns a particular hotel to a manager (one to one relationship)
        Parameters:
        hotel - hotel instance parameter

      • bookRoom

        public boolean bookRoom​(int number)
        Method which lets the manager choose a room by its number in order to book it
        Parameters:
        number - number of the room
        Returns:
        true if the room is successfully booked or false if the room number is invalid or room is occupied

      • checkForFreeRooms

        public boolean checkForFreeRooms()
        Method which lets the manager check for free rooms by iterating through all of the rooms and book the first vacant one
        Returns:
        true if there is a free room or false if there are no free rooms

      • clearBookings

        public void clearBookings()
        Make all rooms available by calling the freeRoom method of each room object
